mean_en: "spending a lot more money or using a lot more of something than you can afford or than is necessary; costing a lot more money than you can afford or is necessary; (of ideas
sentence: The family lives in an extravagant house.
sentence_trans: 这家人住在奢华的房子里。
word_etyma: extra超过 + vag漫游 + ant表形容词 → 漫游多的 → extravagant奢侈的，无节制的
